A4.text: Cook was promoted to lieutenant and named as commander of the expedition.

A5.text: The Admiralty proposed James Cook, a naval officer with a background in mathematics and cartography.

A6.text: Captain Cook authored a journal of his first voyage around the world.

A7.text: HMS Resolution (1771), the vessel of Captain James Cook in his explorations.

A8.text: Named after the 1771-launched Resolution commanded by James Cook.
